description: Returns aggregated campaign data with researched prospects and personalized emails ready for review
test_message_used: Process this request and coordinate sub-agents
raw_test_response:
Thank you for your request! To proceed with campaign orchestration, I need the following details:
1. Company context (target industry, product/service, value proposition)
2. Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) criteria (target job titles, company sizes, geographies, etc.)

Please provide this information so I can initiate prospect research and coordinate the workflow.
